strings:
You don't appear to be in any Rider fights now...
{0} has started a Rider Taisen! SHABADOOBIE TOUCH /join TO HENSHIN! (and probably die.) A new Rider Taisen has been started by {0}! SHABADOOBIE TOUCH /join TO HENSHIN!
{0} has started a chaotic Rider Taisen! SHABADOOBIE TOUCH /join TO HENSHIN! (and probably die.) A new chaotic Rider Taisen has been started by {0}! SHABADOOBIE TOUCH /join TO HENSHIN!
You can't join now! Next round of Rider Taisen, please!
You've already joined the queue!
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough players, cancelling Rider Taisen!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join the Rider Taisen!
Sorry, the Rider Taisen is already full!
{0} has gotten ready to HENSHIN! {1} in queue! Min. queue {2}, max. queue {3}.
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. You may not
HENSHIN! until you do.
No point fleeing; you've already exploded!
{0} has self-destructed!
{0} was {1}
{0} Characters remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be in this Rider Taisen...
I can't find a Rider by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to betray {1}.
{0} has voted to Rider Kick {1}!.
{0} was so busy fighting grunts, he forgot to vote two fights in a row. {0} gets overwhelmed by grunts (what a loser!), and dies embarrassingly. {1}
You willingly induce a transformation into a Kaijin - finally, your dreams of being the strongest have come true.
Choice accepted.
\nThe Cafe Owner is {0}. \nAs far as you know, only {0} the Cafe Owner could have given legitimate information to the cast.
{0} was the Cafe Owner. Wanting to prove your rapport with the rest of the characters, you take over the cafe.
{0} has already learned how to make good coffee, and has now stepped up to fill
{1}'s place as the new Cafe Owner.
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to Rider Kick?
Whose background info do you want to check?
Who do you want to shoot? {0} bullet(s) remain.
Who do you want to approach?
Whose information do you want to gather?
Who do you want to give a rousing speech to?
Who do you eliminate for Shocker?
Who do you suspect of being a Shocker Grunt? Time to punch them!
Who’s your aniki?
Who do you want to recruit as the newest Shocker Grunt?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are Kamen Rider Ryugen (cursed 😾). If Shocker ever threatens your existence, you will betray your Rider brethren and sell them out!
You are Kamen Rider Lazer (detective 🕵). During the commercial break, you can conduct background checks on your fellow cast members. However, there is a 40% chance the Kaijin will notice you!
You are Kamen Rider Dark Kabuto (drunk 🍻). If the Kaijin manage to eliminate you, you will go down in a blaze of glory, distracting them from rest of the cast with your heroic sacrifice!
You are Kamen Rider Fourze (Guardian Angel 👼) - each commercial break, you give a cast member moral support with the power of friendship to withstand another assault from Shocker. However, if you try befriending a Kaijin, there is a 50% chance they will take you out for the hell of it.
You are Kamen Rider Diend (gunner 🔫)! If you want to steal someone’s treasure, you can shoot them - but your Final Attack Ride sound effect and gaudy finisher reveals your location.
You are the Rider Girl (harlot 💋). You act really cute and let the Riders feel heroic, but if you behave that way to Shadowmoon or Kaijin, they will eliminate you for…. Reasons. If Shadowmoon or Kaijin look for you while you’re out with a Rider, they won’t snoop around because even Evil Has Standards, and nothing will happen to you.
You are Kamen Rider Baron (traitor🖕). When nobody else can challenge your strength, you assume the identity of a Kaijin to assert your dominance on the world. Strength is everything! The Cafe Owner may identify you as a potential enemy, so beware!
YOU ARE A KAIJIN (WOLF 🐺)! Each episode, you can eliminate a cast member when they let their guard down. ALL FOR THE GLORY OF SHOCKER!
You are the Cafe Owner (seer 👳). Each episode, you may make small talk with other cast members and deduce their true identity.
You are a Regular Human (Villager 👱), existing only to be the victims of Shocker. You were hoping to be an actual character? Nah, you're really just a sad background cast member (Villager 👱). Too bad!
You are Kamen Rider Ouja(tanner 👺). If the cast wants to pre-emptively take you out, you unleash Genocider and suck everyone into a black hole!
You are Kamen Rider Chalice (wild child 👶). You live as a Regular Human, but once you witness the death of the humans you’ve made friends with, you vow vengeance on humanity and embrace your Kaijin nature.
You are the Part-time Cafe Worker (beholder 👁). You know who the real Cafe Owner is.
You are the Cafe Assistant (apprentice seer 🙇). Someday, if the Cafe Owner (seer) is gone, you must take over to maintain the Cafe so the Riders have somewhere to return to.
You are a Shocker Grunt (Cultist 👤), concerned only with spreading the gospel of Shocker. Everyone else can be lured into the simple life of a Shocker Grunt except ambitious Kaijin and Shadowmoon - the more Grunts, the merrier!
You are Kamen Rider Accel (Cultist Hunter 💂). If Shocker Grunts try to convert you, the newest member (also the fall guy) will get arrested. Each episode, you may launch an investigation into any cast member, arresting them if they are a Shocker Grunt.
The end of the episode draws near, and the cast gathers to decide who they are going to RIDER KICK! Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now the commercial break. All of you have {0} seconds to take a pee break and discuss the events of the episode. It is now the commercial break. All of you have {0} seconds to discuss potential spoilers and toy catalogues.
The episode has begun. Everyone prepares for battle. Actual characters, you have {0} seconds to use your actions! The episode has begun. Everyone readies for a fight, loading their weapons and charging their gimmicks. Actual characters, you have {0} seconds to use your actions!
The cast has voted, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} has been RIDER KICKED AND EXPLODES! {1} The cast has voted for their choice of candidate, {0}. {0} has been RIDER KICKED AND EXPLODES! {1}
It looks like communications broke down like a regular Faiz episode; nobody was RIDER KICKED.
Just like Micchy, the entire cast mopes around and doesn’t really achieve anything this episode.
Something is fishy, for no one voted! Is Toei on holiday?
The cast members find {0} on the floor. It’s GAME OVER for Kamen Rider Lazer!.
Kamen Rider Fourze, {0}, has been eliminated by Shocker - there goes your moral support and friendship.
Kamen Rider Diend, {0}, has had the Diend Driver stolen, and loses his only reason to live - he can’t steal from other dimensions anymore.
The episode opens with a notice was pasted at {0}'s door. The Cafe got bought over by a dubious CEO of a large company, and Kaijin have conveniently wrecked the place… and the Owner as well.
The cast sank to their knees, mourning the death of Kamen Rider Dark Kabuto, {0}. His heroic sacrifice will always be remembered.
The cast hears a small scream, and find the remains of {0}’s cosplay outfits! The Ambitious Cosplayer made an outfit that was was a little too realistic, and got eliminated.
Everyone hears an explosion, and finds the smouldering remains of {0}.\n{1} {0} puts up a fight, but Shocker has deemed {0} unfit for further experimentation, and eliminates him! \n{1}
The air is filled with traces of steam, jet exhaust and static electricity near {0}. A Shocker Grunt just got busted by Kamen Rider Accel! {0} hears the sound of the Engine blade, shortly before he explodes. Despair was his goal, courtesy of Kamen Rider Accel
The cast gathers and sighs - it was yet another filler episode with absolutely no story or development. Bad jokes, meaningless hijinks and extended commercial breaks - filler episode ahoy!. The subbers seem to have taken a break - expect the next episode in a few days. An important softball game has taken over the timeslot - see you next episode!.
A Kaijin corners you, and just as it charges its hissatsu, you drop your weapon and plead for mercy, and promise to betray the cast like you betrayed your own brother in exchange for your own pathetic life.
Your fellow Kaijin: {0}
{0} gets cornered, but promises to betray the cast in exchange for mercy. Say hello to the new member of Shocker!
You get hit by an attack out of nowhere, and feel yourself being dragged away by Shocker as you fade into unconsciousness. Shocker agents grab you from behind, injecting you with a sedative. You’ve been eliminated! You let down your guard! A CGI attack strikes you from behind, and you slump over, unconscious.
Oh no! {0} was Kamen Rider Dark Kabuto! He stood between you and the cast as they ran off, and you were forced to eliminate him before he gets in your way again.
You tried to preach lessons of morality to a Kaijin, and got ripped to shreds.
You raise {0}'s spirits, preventing him from falling into despair and giving in to Shocker’s attacks.
{0} was perfectly fine, and you wasted precious screentime trying to cheer him up.
You visited {0}, but he had better things to do that episode.
Kamen Rider Fourze gives you a rousing speech, and you feel justice running through your veins - you have been renewed in spirit, and shake off Shocker’s attacks as if nothing happened.
The Rider Girl chose the wrong time to act cute, and got eliminated by Shocker. {0} got dragged away, kicking and screaming!
{0} was out trying to get the attention of the rest of the cast, and you slink back into the shadows, waiting for the next episode to attack. Stupid fanservice.
{0} tried to be kawaii to a Kaijin, who eliminated her out of sheer irritation.
{0} tried to be kawaii to a Kaijin, and before anyone could do anything, the Kaijin threw her into the ocean which appears every time a dramatic fight happens near water.
The Rider Girl skipped towards {1}, only to see a Kaijin blasting {1} when he lowered his guard. Hearing the Rider Girl scream, the Kaijin shot {0} as well, and dragged them both away!
{0} had a good time appealing to the male cast last episode. Pantsu for days!
The Rider Girl filled you with so much joy, but spent so much of your hard-eared money at the Cafe that you forget everything that transpired once you double-checked your coffers.
You saw Kamen Rider Lazer release his transformation - it’s {0}! You hear {0}’s Gamer Driver announcing his transformation - BAKUSOU BIKE! He’s Kamen Rider Lazer!
You take a look at {0}’s files, and discover he’s {1}. You told a few white lies and got some information - {0} is actually {1}.
The Rider Girl caused {0} to miss out on some treasure - ain’t nobody got time fo’ dat! {1} got the brunt of Attack Ride: Blast!.
ATTACK RIDE: BLAST! {0} stands over {1}'s body, the DiendDriver still smoking at the barrel. {2} The DiendDriver lets loose a few shots, and {1} explodes! {0} rummages through the remains for loot, but finds none. What were you expecting, a new card? {2}
The Kaijin has completed his directive - Shocker can now conquer the world! The Kaijin assumes its ultimate form, and the cast hasn’t been upgraded enough to withstand the onslaught!
The Kaijin manage to gain the upper hand in a final assault, conquering the world for the glory of Shocker! The Kaijin combine their powers into a humongous blast, defeating the entire cast, who conveniently happen to be standing in a group.
The cast put their hopes, dreams and emotions behind the forces of justice, and together they have eliminated the forces of evil!
The cast manages to piss Kamen Rider Ouja off, and he ruins everyone’s day by summoning Genocider - embrace despair in a black hole!
Remaining players in the episode:
{0} has managed to convince {1} on the benefits of joining Shocker.
{0} approached {1}, only to get struck by a cleverly concealed Engine Blade. {0} got arrested by Kamen Rider Accel!
{0} approached you and felt the wrath of the Engine Blade; {1} remain! Clearly that Shocker Grunt was too new!
You have joined the ranks of the Shocker Grunts. EEEEEE!
Shocker Grunts: {0}
{0} has become a Shocker Grunt!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and recruit {1}... but couldn’t find him.
All the Kaijin have been busted, and the only people left standing are all Shocker Grunts! Who’s the superior combatant now? EEEEEEEEE!
On a lead, you wanted to arrest {0}, but all you find is a slightly singed black costume.
You locate {0} and throw your Engine Blade at him, knocking him out cold. Time for a raise!
You go to {0}’s last known location, but {0} has a strong alibi. Your handcuffs have to wait.
{0}'s friends are gone! In their desperation and anger, they fully embrace their nature as Kaijin!
{0}, your human friends, are gone! To survive, you embrace your inner Kaijin, and are filled with tremendous hate Your
new teammates are: {1}
a Regular Human (a Villager) 👱
Kamen Rider Dark Kabuto (the Drunk) 🍻
the Rider Girl (the Harlot) 💋
the Cafe Owner (the Seer) 👳
Kamen Rider Baron(the Traitor) 🖕
Kamen Rider Fourze (the Guardian Angel) 👼
Kamen Rider Lazer (the Detective) 🕵
a Kaijin (a Werewolf) 🐺
Kamen Rider Ryugen (the Cursed) 😾
Kamen Rider Diend (the Gunner) 🔫
Kamen Rider Ouja (the Tanner) 👺
the Ambitious Cosplayer (the Fool) 🃏
Kamen Rider Chalice (the Wild Child) 👶
the Part-time Cafe Worker (the Beholder) 👁
the Cafe Assistant (the Apprentice Seer) 🙇
a Shocker Grunt (MLM) (a Cultist) 👤
Kamen Rider Accel (the Cultist Hunter) 💂
Fled the show
eliminated by Shocker
A regular cast member
Players Alive
Riotrooper 👷
You are a Riotrooper (a Mason) 👷. You band together with the rest of the Riotroopers (if there are, they will be stated) and attempt not to die, keeping a low profile.
The cast members hear a tiny, almost unnoticeable explosion. {0}, one of the Riotroopers, has been taken out.. As usual. {0}, a Riotrooper, explodes after being taken out from behind - basically the fate of every Riotrooper.
The other Riotroopers are: {0}
Your newest Shocker Grunt approaches {0}’s last known location to recruit them, but instead finds the remnants of an intense battle.
{0} is motivated by Kamen Rider Fourze, giving him enough strength to trudge through another episode despite his injuries.
You send {0} to spread the good word of Shocker, but {1} was unconvinced.
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined the fight. Please change your name to
join.
You put on some make-up and skip towards {0}, sees him hastily tucking away a gimp mask. What’s going on desu? As you end your giggling fit, you hear {0} drag his laughter with a “hehehEEEEEEEEEE!”. Normal people don’t laugh like that!
was
Everyone notices that {0} is not around. They search the entire episode, but only find {0}'s accessories. As the cast gathers, they find {0} missing.
{0} didn't show up for the weekly Riotrooper support group. Weird..
Abandoning the fight while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is a goner. has been looted and left for dead.
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a Rider Taisen! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple Rider Taisens. Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on
{0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no Rider Taisen ongoing. Start a new Rider Taisen with /startgame or start a chaos Rider Taisen with
/startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No Cafe Owner!
Time's up! Too slow!
You are Kamen Rider Skull (cupid 🏹)! Choose 2 parties to inspire to take up the mantle of Kamen Rider W, the half-and-half Rider!
You are the last Roidmude (doppelganger 🎭). You have learnt to imitate someone to blend in, and hopefully remain undiscovered to keep your species alive.
You are Kamen Rider Decade (hunter 🎯). Everyone fears you because you have a little dirt on everyone’s powers. If anyone attacks or even approaches you, there is a chance you can take one of them down with you.
You are Shadowmoon! (serial killer 🔪) You win when nothing’s left standing - Riders, humans and Kaijin alike. If Kaijin attack you, you’ll survive, taking one of them out in the process.
You have been irrevocably inspired by Kamen Rider Skull. {0} is your half-and-half partner as Kamen Rider W. Your goal is for both of you to survive. If one of you
disappears, the other one will no longer be able to function, and is practically fresh meat for Shocker. W-B-X! You have been inspired to become Kamen Rider W with {0}! If your partner disappears, you won’t be able to function at all, and Narumi Detective Agency will get shut down.
The cast has chosen to throw you under the bus! This is your last chance, use FinalAttackRide and take him down with you!
{0} fumbles for his FinalAttackRide cards, but got stabbed through the Decadriver. Whoops!.
{0} hesitates to land the final blow, and gets stabbed through the Decadriver anyway.
Just before Kamen Rider Decade gets Rider Kicked, {0} FinalAttackRides {1}, before both disappear in a fiery explosion. {2}
You've been beaten within an inch of your life! Quick, pull out your FinalAttackRide!
You've been hit! With your dying breath, which form will you use to take someone down with you?
{0} gets stabbed through the Decadriver before he has a chance to retaliate.
As {0} lays there, stabbed through the Decadriver, he looks forlornly at the cards in his hand, then explodes.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground.... And pulls a last-minute FinalAttackRide on {1}, who explodes alongside the crafty Kamen Rider Decade! {2}
{0} creeps behind {1}, who anticipates the meeting and takes him out in a single punch. The Shocker Grunts sends {0} to try to recruit {1}, but Shadowmoon reveals himself with a Rider Punch!
The Kaijin try to catch Kamen Rider Decade unaware, but he retaliates! {0} was pushed to the front, bearing the brunt of a full FinalAttackRide!.
The Kaijin, {0}, attempted to attack Kamen Rider Decade, but was countered by a timely FinalAttackRide and exploded! t
{0} the Kaijin approached an unsuspecting (or so he thought) victim from behind, only to get brutally beaten down. It was actually Shadowmoon!
{0} screamed as he got attacked from behind, {1} exploding in a ball of fire. {0} stood absolutely no chance.
You tried to eliminate {0}, but he withstood your onslaught thanks to a rousing speech by Kamen Rider Fourze, and you slink away to fight another day..
The Shocker Grunts send {0} to try to recruit {1}, but {0} didn’t even realise Kamen Rider Accel was waiting..
You tried to give a speech to a Rider, but he revealed his true allegiance - he was secretly Shadowmoon! BOOM!
You attempted to chat up {0}, but he turned around and punched you in the face.
The Rider Girl, {0}, screamed so loudly the cast could hear her from a mile away - but when they got there, they could only find a singed spot on the floor and drag marks..
The Roidmude {0} has now become a Riotrooper, just like you!
{0} has disappeared, and you pick up his belt. Your Riotrooper comrade(s) (if any) is/are: {1}
The Roidmude {0} has learnt the ways of Shocker Grunts, and will now spread the good word of Shocker.
{0} has disappeared, and the Roidmude quietly takes his place. Your fellow Shocker Grunts (if any) are: {1}
The Roidmude {0} has observed the destructive tendencies of the Kaijin, and have assumed their form as well.
{0} has been defeated. You quietly assume his form and plot your destructive rampage. Your fellow Kaijin (if any) are: {1}
The only one left standing is Shadowmoon - nothing will stand in his way! The cast lies mostly burning in a crater, and only Shadowmoon remains standing amongst the flames.
Who do you want to attack?
With {0} ebbing away, {1} rushes over to resuscitate him, to no avail. {1} loses all hope and faith in what he thought was justice. {2}
Who do you want to copy if they get eliminated or defeated?
Who do you want to inspire to be half of Kamen Rider W? Choose the first player
Who do you want to inspire to half of be Kamen Rider W? Choose the second player
Kamen Rider Decade (the Hunter) 🎯
Kamen Rider Skull (the Cupid) 🏹
Shadowmoon (the Serial Killer) 🔪
the Roidmude (the Doppelgänger) 🎭
You have become Kamen Rider Chalice. You watch {0}, in the hope that he teaches you how to fully be human. If he gets eliminated, you’ll fully embrace your Kaijin nature.
Everyone else is dead except Kamen Rider W! They’ll now rebuild the city from scratch, and make their mentor Narumi Sokichi proud.
A slightly burnt card featuring the image of {0} was found on the ground. Looks like Kamen Rider Decade decided to take them out for the hell of it! {1}
A Shocker Grunt attempted to preach to you about the glorious ambitions of Shocker, but their gimp suit turns you waaaaay off.
You are already on the wait list for the next Rider Taisen {0}
You have been added to the wait list for the next Rider Taisen on {0}. I will PM you when the next game is
starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new Rider Taisen is starting in {0}
{0} meets {1}, and casually reveals his true form as Shadowmoon. {1} was swiftly defeated. {1} realised that {0} was secretly Shadowmoon, but he was too late, and got swiftly Rider Punched in the face.
The cast has all left, and only filler content and evil supporting characters remain.
As the sun rises, {0} and {1} face off in The Quarry Where Every Important Battle Happens (you know, THAT quarry).. {0} tries to get the upper hand on {1}, but
{1} swiftly executes his Final Attack Ride, and swiftly defeats Shadowmoon.
You failed to make a choice, so your instinct has randomly chosen someone to make friends with : {0}
Won
Lost
Behind the scenes, {0} was actually fired from the show due to a contractual dispute after not turning up {1} times in the past few episodes.
a
You’re a Regular Human.\n \n(Villager) 👱! You exist only to be the victims of random Kaijin and Shadowmoon attacks or as a plot device. Enjoy your (mostly) meaningless existence!
You’re the head honcho of everyone’s favourite Cafe, \n \nThe Cafe Owner
(Seer) 👳. To curry favour with you, cast members engage in deeper conversations that you’d like, but you gain valuable info that you can reveal, but that makes you a prime target for Kaijin and Shadowmoon.
You’re a Kaijin\n \n (Werewolf)
🐺.\nThe main agents of Shocker, Kaijin wreak havoc on everyone and drive the plot..\nBut you’re not invincible - your only hope is to take out as many cast members as possible.. And hopefully conquer the world in the name of Shocker!
Kawaii desu! \n \nYou’re the Rider Girl (Harlot)
💋 that everyone loves!! \nYou act really cute in the hopes that people will give you attention, and they do!\nIf the Kaijin visits you while you are in someone else’s company, nothing will happen to you.
You were once evil, but have seen the light. \n \n Kamen Rider Dark Kabuto (Drunk) 🍻 attempts to atone for his previous misdeeds by doing good, and will valiantly fight to the death to distract other agents of Shocker should they attempt to take him out.!
Blood isn’t thicker than water. \n \nYou are Kamen Rider Ryugen BUDOU ARMS (Cursed) 😾. You pretend to be cheerful to gain the trust of the main cast and secretly hope to fit in, but won’t think twice about betraying them in order to survive..
You hold dreams of being the strongest - you’re Kamen Rider Baron\n \nI (Traitor) 🖕. When nobody else can challenge your strength, you assume the identity of a Kaijin to assert your dominance on the world. Strength is everything! The Cafe Owner may identify you as a potential enemy, so beware!
You are Kamen Rider Fourze (Guardian Angel) 👼. Each commercial break, you give a cast member moral support with the power of friendship to withstand another assault from Shocker. However, if you try befriending Shadowmoon, there is a 50% chance they will take you out for the hell of it.\n \n
BAKUSOU BIKE! \n \nSomething’s fishy, and we need someone to look into people’s files. Enter Kamen Rider Lazer (Detective) 🕵 ! Mistrust of almost everyone has led you to a life of lying and deceit, even though you’re doing your best to make their lives better.. Without them actually realising anything. Be careful though, snooping around may cause your identity to be revealed thanks to your gaudy, loud transformation.
Treasure? Where?\n \nAs Kamen Rider Diend (Gunner) 🔫, you’re able to blast people and take their treasure, all while ambiguously furthering the ploy. Save your ammo though, you only have two shots.
Your only aim is to piss everyone off - you’re Kamen Rider Ouja (Tanner) 👺. Normally you only go around being a general asshole to everyone, but once everyone decides to call you out on it, it’s time to call out your little Mirror Monster friend, Genocider. Say bye to the entire damn cast if that happens!.
While there are deluded fanboys, you take it one step further.\n \nAs an ambitious cosplayer (Fool)🃏, you’ve pretty much convinced yourself that you’re part of the cast, with self-insertion fanfics and surprisingly immersive costumes.
EEEEEEEEE!\n \nGimp suits and masks are your thing, you’re a Shocker Grunt (Cultist) 👤! Time to spread the good word of Shocker!.
Shocker incidents have been on the rise, and it’s time to take up the Engine Blade.\n \nAs Kamen Rider Accel (Cult Hunter) 💂, you arrest Shocker Grunts as and when you encounter them. HEN… SHIN!
Are humans friends or food?\n \nYou’re Kamen Rider Chalice (Wild Child) 👶. You live as a Regular Human, but once you witness the death of the humans you’ve made friends with, you vow vengeance on humanity and embrace your Kaijin nature.
One coffee coming right up, Owner!\n
\nAs the Assistant Cafe Owner (Apprentice Seer) 🙇, you’re poised to take over the Cafe should the Cafe Owner go missing - but hey, who would wanna get rid of the old man, right?
Earning minimum wage? Check. Dead-end job? Check..\n \nAs the Part-Time Cafe Worker, (Beholder) 👁 , you know who the real Cafe Owner is, but care little beyond that.
Riders, but not really. But yeah, Riders.\n \nAs a Riotrooper (Mason) 👷,
You band together with the rest of the Riotroopers (if there are, they will be stated) and attempt not to die, keeping a low profile.
Keep your species alive!\n \nYou’re the Roimude (Doppelgänger) 🎭. You have learnt to imitate someone to blend in, and hopefully remain undiscovered.\nNote: If
the original cast member becomes a Shocker Grunt, they will take on their original role. All other normal rules
apply: If they were Kamen Rider Chalice and their friends are gone, the Roidmude will develop straight into a Kaijin.
Otherwise, they will inherit their friends.\nThe Shocker Grunts cannot convert you
(but can after the you imitate someone else). Also - you can NOT win unless you have take over a
role. (exception: you’re half of Kamen Rider W).
Now, count up your sins!\n \nKamen Rider Skull
(Cupid) 🏹 can choose 2 parties to inspire to take up the mantle of Kamen Rider W, the half-and-half Rider!\n \nNote: The chosen ones will know who each other
is, but not be told their roles. If they are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If they are on different teams (Kaijin + Shocker Grunts), and one team wins (Kaijin), the lover (Shocker Grunt) wins as well.
TL;DR if both are alive at the end, and at least one of them was on the winning team, they both win
together.
You know every Rider’s powers, sometimes better than they know the powers themselves! \n \nYou are Kamen Rider Decade
(Hunter) 🎯. Everyone fears you because you have a little dirt on everyone’s powers. If anyone attacks or even approaches you, there is a chance you can take one of them down with you.\n \nNote: For Kaijin, the chance to take them out starts at 30%. If there is one Kaijin, you have a 30% chance to
defeat the Kaijin and survive. For each additional Kaijin, add 20% (2 Kaijins = 50%, 3 = 70%,
etc). However - if there are multiple Kaijins, the Kaijins will select one of their counterparts to be
the fall guy, and you will still be overwhelmed. \nIf a Shocker Grunt tries to recruit you, he has a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to eliminate him.
You’ve been modified heavily by Shocker in a gross imitation of a warrior of justice.. And you’re VERY unhappy about it. \n \nThe one and
only Shadowmoon (serial killer) 🔪 used to be human! Since gaining cyborg status, Shadowmoon has
decided to purify the world.. By destroying it! \n \nThey can win only if they are the last player (exception: They’re half of Kamen Rider W). If the Kaijins try to attack you, they have a four-in-five chance of losing the battle and getting eliminated!
O HAI DER!

You are Kamen Rider Ichigo (Mayor 🎖). The most senior rider and possibly the most badass, your words carry extra weight with the cast..
You are Kamen Rider G (Prince 👑)!!! If the other cast members try to get rid of you, you remind them that you’re an unofficial Rider, and therefore not canon so they can’t do a thing. The agents of Shocker disagree, though, and will still attack you.
You are Kamen Rider Scissors (Clumsy Guy 🤕). You’re a bumbling buffoon who gets abused by his own Mirror Monster, and half the time, you don’t really know who your real target is and blindly attack.. If you manage to, that is..
You are Kamen Rider Kaixa (Sorcerer 🔮), who prefers to be an asshole to everyone. Of course, that means siding with the Kaijin if you have to, just to be a bigger asshole. Keep a lookout for the Cafe Owner too, he’ll call you out on your assholery.
You are Kamen Rider Odin (Blacksmith ⚒). You’re able to use your Time Vent to repeat an entire day, leaving the cast with their memories but forcing the agents of Shocker to backtrack for absolutely no reason.
You are the Great Leader of Shocker (Alpha Wolf ⚡)! Your powers enable you to eliminate anyone with the greatest of ease, but sometimes you feel an individual might make a good Kaijin, and you have a chance to convert him into the Rider’s latest enemy.
You are the Great Leader of Neo-Shocker (Wolf Cub 🐶). Slated to be the successor of the Great Leader of Shocker, you are considered so valuable that
all the Kaijins either look up to you because of your privilege, or are jealous because you didn’t have to work as hard. Once you are out of the picture, however, everyone would want to
start impressing the Great Leader for the next fast-track upgrade, so the Kaijins will work harder to
prove themselves!
As the cast debates getting rid of {0}, they are reminded of his temporal existence and inability to influence any other plot besides that weird episode, and leave Kamen Rider G to his alcoholic tendencies.
You try to be an asshole to {0}, but {0} doesn’t react and reveal his true intentions and feelings and whatever else the plot demands. But you’re sure he’s not a Kaijin or Cafe Owner.
{0} steps forward and does an iconic henshin (ignore the dated CGI, please), and his aura of power as Kamen Rider Ichigo leaves many mouths agape. Sempai has noticed you all!
From now on, {0}'s votes for Rider Kicking people will count twice. {0} quickly brandishes his iconic belt, transforming amidst dated CGI and sound effects. He's actually Kamen Rider Ichigo! From now on, {0}'s votes
for Rider Kicking people will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as Kamen Rider Ichigo!
Reveal
Would you like to activate your time vent, resetting the entire day?
As the rest of the cast mill about, they notice gold feathers falling. {0} activated his Time Vent, looping the entire day. Everyone still remembers what happened though, but agents of Shocker are unable to carry out their nefarious schemes.

As the Kaijins converge on {0}, {1} stops everyone, being the Great Leader of Shocker. {1} sees potential in {0} and
provides {0} an illusion of choice to be converted into Kaijin. The experiment will be complete the next episode.
You were nearly eliminated, but the Great Leader of Shocker saw potential in you. Instead of being eliminated, you have been converted into a Kaijin!
You wake up on a surgical bed, and notice your new, malformed body. Welcome to the life of a Kaijin.
Your reputation as Kamen Rider Ichigo (mayor 🎖) gives your opinions weight, but when you’re not transformed, you look like another plump old man. Sometimes, that’s not really a bad thing, though. Reveal your identity when it’s time to pull your weight!
You are Kamen Rider G (Prince 👑)! If the other cast members try to get rid of you, you remind them that you’re an unofficial Rider, and therefore not canon so they can’t do a thing. The agents of Shocker disagree, though, and will still attack you.
Kamen Rider Kaixa (Sorcerer 🔮) is *only* interested in being an asshole! who prefers to be an asshole to everyone. Of course, that means siding with the Kaijin if you have to, just to be a bigger asshole. Keep a lookout for the Cafe Owner too, he’ll call you out on your assholery.
You are Kamen Rider Scissors (Clumsy 🤕). You’re a bumbling buffoon who gets abused by his own Mirror Monster, and half the time, you don’t really know who your real target is and blindly attack.. If you manage to, that is. (You have 50% chances to vote for someone random.)
You’re Kamen Rider Odin (Blacksmith ⚒). You’re able to use your Time Vent to repeat an entire day, leaving the cast with their memories but forcing the agents of Shocker to backtrack for absolutely no reason.
You are the Great Leader of Shocker (Alpha Wolf ⚡), the one who started it all. Your powers enable you to eliminate anyone with the greatest of ease, but sometimes you feel an individual might make a good Kaijin, and you have a chance to convert him into the Rider’s latest enemy. (20% chance)
You are the Great Leader of Neo-Shocker (Wolf Cub 🐶). Slated to be the successor of the Great Leader of Shocker, you are considered so valuable that
all the Kaijins either look up to you because of your privilege, or are jealous because you didn’t have to work as hard. Once you are out of the picture, however, everyone would want to
start impressing the Great Leader for the next fast-track upgrade, so the Kaijins will work harder to
prove themselves!

The Shocker Grunts send {0} to try to convert {1}, but {0} was struck in the face for his audacity at approaching a superior agent of Shocker! {0} has been destroyed!
{0} offered to go out with {1}, only to find {1} being attacked by Shadowmoon! {1} weakly tells {0} to run, and {0} leaves him to his doom, weeping ever so cutely.
It appears {0} was caught in the crossfire in a Kaijin battle, and now the Cafe Owner has no more successor..
{0}'s machinations have come to an end - they’ve found your weak spot and punched you like Ryuki did, and you’re forced to erase your entire existence in shame.
{0} tried to convert Shadowmoon, and got dismissed with extreme prejudice (a Rider Punch to the face, to be specific). EEEEE!
Kamen Rider Skull, {0}, has been taken out by Shadowmoon. Kamen Rider W hangs his (their?) head in shame, and picks up Kamen Rider Skull’s damaged hat.
{0} was attacked by Shadowmoon, and put up a hard fight.. But Shadowmoon was only toying with him to pass the time, and eliminated him once he got bored. {0} took blow after blow from Shadowmoon, desperate to atone for his sins… but it was all in vain, and he exploded in a blaze of despair.
{0} was pre-emptively taken out by Shadowmoon before he could empower the cast to stand against evil.
Looks like {0} was too busy looting to notice Shadowmoon! By the time Kamen Rider Diend fumbled for some cards, Shadowmoon already primed his Rider Punch, taking care of the sneaky thief for good..
{0} fought valiantly, but age caught up with the veteran rider, and he lost to the new and improved cyborg Rider from Shocker..
Shadowmoon has struck again! {0}, Kamen Rider G, was reminded of his meaningless existence before he was hit by a well-timed Rider Punch that shattered his wine bottle, and he escaped back to his weird variety show from whence he came.
The Cafe Owner, {0}, was working on the latest coffee blend when he heard a noise behind him. Being a jolly old man, he was halfway through a “hello” when a devastating punch all but decapitated him.
Kamen Rider Kaixa, {0}, was found to have disintegrated into a pile of grey ash. He would have made a
good tag team with the Kaijins, if they had known!
Oops! The Kaijin just took out a dormant member of their own kind, {0}! They could have employed
{0} into their ranks!
Kamen Rider Accel, {0}, tried investigating Shadowmoon. As with all Neo-Heisei Riders, his reliance on finicky gadgets has been his undoing, and Shadowmoon gets the jump on him!
The Kaijins were milling about when {0}, the newest Shocker Grunt,
foolishly approached them. The subsequent beating was explodey and mildly entertaining.
{0} quickly learnt the strength of Shadowmoon the hard way, as {0} lay battered on the ground, his last EEEEEEEE escaping his lips..
Kamen Rider Fourze, {0}, pretty much asked for it! {0} attempted to convince Shadowmoon to use his powers for good, and got a swift punch to the face as a deadly reply.
Kamen Rider Fourze, {0}, visited the Kaijins. Big mistake.
Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to attack {0}, but {0}'s powers as an official Mary Sue allow him to pre-empt the showdown and overpower the final Kaijin!
Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest - taking shitty polaroid pictures. Eliminating Kamen Rider Decade proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains {0}'s broken Decadriver.
{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a gimp mask shoved unceremoniously into {0}'s backpack, the righteous Kamen Rider Accel, {1}, draws their Engine Blade, putting an end to the weird, slightly twisted life of the Shocker Grunt.
